blog.subtext: The latest news, intel, and analysis straight from Carbophile Group.

conferences.body: We would be honored to talk at your conference to discuss cybersecurity, open-source, or privacy.
conferences.subtitle: Presentations & talks

k12.body: We can help you educate the next generation of digital citizens with our engaging lectures and presentations.
k12.subtitle: Lectures

ngos.body: We can co-host workshops, hackathons, and other events to engage our community.
ngos.subtitle: Workshops & events

collaborate.prose: Are you a cybersecurity expert, teacher, educational insituion, or policymaker? We are always looking for new ways to collaborate and make a positive impact. Whether you want to contribute to our research, organize a joint event, or simply share your ideas, we'd love to hear from you.

researchers.body: We are always looking for talented researchers to join our team and contribute to our mission of producing unbiased, high-quality analysis and research papers on emerging threats, best practices, and digital rights.
researchers.subtitle: Research & vulnerability assessments

common.copyright: Â© 2025 Carbophile Group. Some rights reserved.

contact.heading: Contact us
contact.prose: Have a question, a project idea, or just want to say hello? We'd love to hear from you.

consulting.answer: We do not offer any consulting service at this point in time.
consulting.question: Do you offer consulting services?

differCommercial.answer: As a non-profit organization, our primary motivation is not to generate profit but provide value for the community. This allows us to offer all our work for free or at a reduced price.
differCommercial.question: How do you differ from commercial cybersecurity companies?

nonprofit.answer: Yes! Carbophile Group is an association pursuant to Article 4 of the Croatian law on associations.
nonprofit.question: Is Carbophile Group a non-profit organization?

projects.answer: We primarily work on producing and freely sharing unbiased, high-quality analysis and research papers on emerging threats, best practices, and digital rights.
projects.question: What kind of projects do you work on?

landing.foundingQuote: I am greatly disappointed with the state of the non-profit cybersecurity sector in Croatia. We have no associations, no privacy advocacies, and no CVE numbering authorities. High-quality resources are few and far between. That's why we founded Carbophile Group, to change that.
landing.mission: At Carbophile Group, our mission is to keep it that way. We are a Croatian collective of cybersecurity experts, developers, and privacy advocates dedicated to building a safer digital world.

projects.subtitle: Explore our latest work and ongoing initiatives.
